charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed on the motion of the United States.

THE DEFENDANT: pleaded guilty to count(s) 1s of a Superseding Information before a U.S. Magistrate Judge on July 5, 2016. IMPRISONMENT: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the Federal Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of: 96 months as to count 1s. The court makes the following recommendations to the Federal Bureau of Prisons: The defendant participates in a BOP sex offender treatment program, and that the offender be designated at a suitable SOMP facility where he can receive such treatment. The defendant is remanded to the custody of the U.S. Marshal. SUPERVISED RELEASE: Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of: ten (10) years on Count 1s. MANDATORY CONDITIONS. STANDARD CONDITIONS OF SUPERVISION. SPECIAL CONDITIONS OF SUPERVISION. No Fine. MSA: $100.00 imposed. No Restitution.
